column4: What could I do when I can't resolve some addresses (e.g. on blogspot) and some pages lack the css and images?
what do you mean "can't resolve some addresses"
and some things are resolvable and others are not?
exactly
what are your dns servers set to?
I pasted them from another (win) computer where all's fine
do you have dnsutils installed ?
no I don't
install the package, then you can do some tests
sorry, if this means nslookup and dig, I have already tried them
dig @212.111.0.10 your.unresolvable.domain a
dig @8.8.8.8 your.unresolvable.domain a
from 8.8.8.8 I have  QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0
what specific domain did you try?
dig +short @8.8.8.8 googleblog.blogspot.com a
QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0
if you're unable to get a respose from 8.8.8.8, its probably a firewall somewhere
where could I find some firewall settings?
before going that way, pastebin the output of: dig @8.8.8.8 googleblog.blogspot.com a; dig googleblog.blogspot.com a; cat /etc/resolv.conf
http://paste.ubuntu.com/1022866/
so, you can resolve the domain using 8.8.8.8 as nameserver, your local resolution was unable to resolve it. Someone here know how best to add a DNS nameserver in Ubuntu?
I tried to add a line in the /etc/resolv.conf (just in a text editor) file but it didn't seem to help
do not edit /etc/resolv.conf by hand
should  I try it another way?
